---
title: 'How to control CMOS cameras'
---

Here the steps needed to connect to MSS system and to control it are described:

1. Connect the camera to the computer in the spectroscopy room.

2. Connect to the computer with
   ```
   ssh -X kaya@kayactrl02
    ```
    Password: kayatest
3. Run the command 
    ```
    spyder 
    ```
to open the python compiler, or
    ```
    spyder --new-instance 
    ```
if it is already opened somewhere else.

4. To connect the cameras run
   ```
   /home/kaya/PythonPrograms/Connect_FGandCamera.py
   ```
    
5. To change camera parameters and acquire run
   ```
   /home/kaya/PythonPrograms/CameraAcquisition.py
   ```
